header.title: A PROVEN WAY TO SELL MORE
header.subtitle: UNREAL ENGINE PLUGINS BY VOORHU

first.title: Ready for Unreal Engine 5
first.desc: Keeping up with the times - say NO to old technologies! Each part of the plugin is optimized to work with Unreal Engine 5.

second.title: Yandex SDK 7
second.desc: We use the full power of the latest SDK from Yandex - we don't use outdated libraries, and we don't advise you not to. Every part of the plugin is maximally optimized to work as fast as possible for all users.

third.title: Affordable Price
third.desc: A lot of people are trying to stop us! But we don't cry to moms like other plugin developers! We rise to the occasion and shove our price down their throats! Why are we doing this? FOR DEMOCRACY!

fourth.title: Our Ideology
fourth.desc: Our ideology is simple - give users an opportunity to earn more and enthusiasts a powerful mobile app development tool.

fifth.title: Support
fifth.desc: We are actively developing our community, we are in touch with you on any issue, we will support you if there are difficulties, come join us!

first.title: Where does VOORHU begin?
first.desc1: Our team consists of three people. Each of us is engaged in completely different projects, but we decided to join forces to create auxiliary software that would facilitate our work.
first.desc2: And so came our first ADSCore Lite plugin for easy integration of Yandex ads into Android mobile apps in Unreal Engine.
first.desc3: This plugin is now available to everyone!
first.desc4: We plan to create many more useful and convenient tools for Unreal Engine developers and not only.

second.title: What is ADSCore Lite?
second.desc1: In 2023, the VOORHU team released their debut project, namely a plugin for Unreal Engine that allows you to monetize your game in two clicks, through the addition of the Yandex advertising network.
second.desc2: The name of the plugin is ADSCore Lite and it is available absolutely free!
